recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich tomato sauce.
preparationSteps: Cook ground beef with onions and garlic
Mix with tomato sauce and simmer

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A flavorful Indian curry with tender chicken pieces in a spiced creamy sauce.
preparationSteps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
Prepare sauce with tomato puree and cream, then combine with chicken

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A crisp salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and a tangy Caesar dressing.
preparationSteps: Toss lettuce with croutons, Parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
